title: How to Harness Mental Accounting to Instill Good Financial Habits
text:
Cicily Maton is partner and senior financial planner with the Planning Center in Chicago. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community. As told to Jacob Meade.
